skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Front-end development focuses on creating the visual and interactive elements of a website or application. Using technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I build user-friendly, responsive interfaces that ensure a seamless experience across all devices.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Back-end development involves building and managing the server-side logic, databases, and APIs that power a website or application. It ensures data is stored, processed, and delivered efficiently, allowing for seamless functionality behind the scenes.

skills.title: Agile Principles
skills.description: Agile principles focus on flexibility, teamwork, and continuous improvement. By breaking projects into smaller tasks, Agile helps teams adapt quickly to changes and deliver value more efficiently.

skills.title: Database Management
skills.description: Database management involves organizing, storing, and retrieving data efficiently. It ensures that information is structured, secure, and accessible, allowing applications to function smoothly and handle data effectively.

portfolio.title: Jen Styles
portfolio.description: Designed a responsive, user-oriented marketing website for a hairstylist to showcase their services products and prices. Created a scrolling image gallery, contact form, and responsive design for web and mobile browsing. Integrated an online booking website, allowing clients to schedule appointments directly through the website.

portfolio.title: Route Planner SRC
portfolio.description: Collaborated in a team using Agile practices for the development of an SRS document for a mobile app, Route Planner, that provides users with various routes while considering many factors. Created UML diagrams and Gnatt chart, as well as functional/non-functional requirements sections.

portfolio.title: GUI Calculator
portfolio.description: I developed a graphical user interface (GUI) calculator that provides a user-friendly experience for performing basic arithmetic operations. The calculator features an intuitive layout, allowing users to easily input numbers and functions while delivering accurate results in real time.

services.title: Front-end Development
services.description: Creating responsive, user-friendly websites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, React

services.title: Back-end Development
services.description: Working with simple databases (SQL) or APIs.

services.title: IT Support
services.description: Assisting with troubleshooting and offering support for software or websites.
